snippet: Speaking in New Hampshire, the likely presidential candidate implicitly criticized his rivals for shifting their stances on contested issues.
abstract: Jeb Bush criticizes his rivals for changing their positions on difficult issues, like Common Core education standards, during debut visit to New Hampshire.

byline.original: By JONATHAN MARTIN and PATRICK HEALY

lead_paragraph: Speaking in New Hampshire, the likely presidential candidate implicitly criticized his rivals for shifting their stances on contested issues.

headline.main: Bush Says He Has ‘Backbone’ on the Common Core
headline.print_headline: Bush Says He Has ‘Backbone’ on the Common Core
